description:
The Snowfall Boots use recyclable rubber and a thermally efficient liner to protect your little one from the elements. And adjustable snow collar and waterproof construction seals the warm in and the cold out.

  • Waterproof nylon upper is fully seam-sealed to keep feet dry
  • Synthetic RubberHe is PVC-free, waterproof, durable and recyclable
  • RubberHe is rated to 1,000,000 flexes and is unaffected to -32°C, offering excellent traction in any weather
  • Nite Rays reflective accents help keep your little one seen
  • Adjustable snow collar is easy to use with gloves or mittens
  • 8mm Zylex® removable liner (97% recycled content) adds warmth
  • Removable frost plate insole
  • IceWave sole with multidirectional lugs offers great grip in slippy winter conditions
  • Kamik rates these boots down to -40°C
name: Kamik Snowfall P2 Winter Boots - Children to Youths
